post.author: 강윤정
post.content:
I've never used a TCP/IP socket full-duplex way, sending & receiving at the same time on a same communication channel.. Have anyone experienced this? Now I am writing sample program to make sure..and we will see...
-->자문자답하는군요. full-duplex로 잘 돌아갑니다..
post.title: The socket on TCP/IP is full-duplex?
